title: Aubergine mixed grill
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 red onion, cut into wedges', '18 spears fresh asparagus, trimmed', '12 crimini mushrooms, stems removed', '455g (16 oz) sliced aubergine, cut into .5cm (1/4 in) thick rounds', '1 red pepper, cut into wedges', '1 yellow pepper, cut into wedges']
